scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.neuralnetwork

Class ConvolutionLayerPyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.neuralnetwork.ConvolutionLayerPyramid

  • public class ConvolutionLayerPyramid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is incomplete class and part of the final requirement.

    This class represents a pyramid of convolutional neural network layers in which the tightening of the outputed warp from the initial neural network is done within.

    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Method Detail

      • calculateWarpFromLevel

        public double[][][] calculateWarpFromLevel(int pyramidLevel,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.awt.image.BufferedImage source,
                                           @NonNull
                                           java.awt.image.BufferedImage target)
        Using the given pyramid level, the convolutional layer will create a series of images patches and derives an improved warp based on patches
        Parameters:
        pyramidLevel - The level in the warp pyramid that the predicted warp is to be generated for.
        source - The source image. cannot be null.
        target - The target image. cannot be null.
        Returns:
        Both the x and y updated warp predicted from the convolutional neural network at that level of the pyramid.

      • trainConvolutionalLayerFromLevel

        public void trainConvolutionalLayerFromLevel(int pyramidLevel,
                                             @NonNull
                                             java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] sourceImages,
                                             java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] tagretImages,
                                             @NonNull
                                             double[][][][] warps)
        Train a convolutional layer within the pyramid
        Parameters:
        pyramidLevel - The level of the pyramid in which the training will occur on.
        sourceImages - The sourceImages that will be used as training data for the network
        tagretImages - The targetImages that will be used as training data for the network
        warps - The x and Y warps for each of the training images
